message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of 3D human pose estimation from a single image using prior knowledge of scene geometry. This involves computer vision (cs.CV) techniques for pose estimation, as well as graphics (cs.GR) techniques for constructing accurate 3D CAD models of the scene. The use of a commercial motion capture system suggests a robotics (cs.RO) component to the research. The proposed view-based representation of scene geometry and the integration of multi-layer depth information into pose estimation involve machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques.
